CodeList.Title: Consumption Tax Category code (Subset of UNCL5305)

Code.Name: Standard rate Consumption Tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that the standard CT rate is levied from the invoicee.

Code.Name: Lower rate Consumption Tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that the lower CT rate is levied from the invoicee.

Code.Name: Exempt from Tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that an item liable for Consumption Tax is exempted due to trade circumstances.

Code.Name: Zero rated goods
Code.Description: Code specifying that the items have a zero rate Consumption Tax.

Code.Name: Free export item, Consumption Tax not charged
Code.Description: Code specifying that the item is free export and taxes are not charged.

Code.Name: Outside scope of tax
Code.Description: Code specifying that the seller is not registered for Consumption Tax.
